title: Introduction to sound
brief_description: Gives examples of the diferent types of sound explaining how all such sounds are produced by a vibrating source. Explains the meaning of the terms oscillation, amplitude and frequency. Animated diagrams are used to show how the human vocal mechanism functions and models are used to demonstrate and explain the functioning of the human ear.
